metadata.title: CVE-2022-48778 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:mtd: rawnand: gpmi: don't leak PM reference in error pathIf gpmi_nfc_apply_timings() fails, the PM runtime usage counter must bedropped.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
